title: Drawing, "Elevation of the Belmont Menagerie, Newport, Rhode Island", ca. 1894
medium: Graphite, brush and brown, black, green, blue, red, and yellow watercolor, white gouache, on cream thin illustration board
description: A colorful proposal for Oliver Belmont's monkey house. The building is to be a three-story structure with a central observation tower, and two flanking wings, here presented in a verdant landscape.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Elevation of the Belmont Menagerie, Newport, Rhode Island", ca. 1894.
ca. 1894. Graphite, brush and brown, black, green, blue, red, and yellow watercolor, white gouache, on cream thin illustration board. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-366.
